Title: Control Arrays .NET
Description: Ability to create control arrays at design time for standard Windows Forms controls, with all the functionality that existed in VB6, in VB.NET using Visual Studio 2010 and the .NET 4.0 framework.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Ability to create control arrays at design time for standard Windows Forms controls, with all the functionality that existed in VB6, in VB.NET using Visual Studio 2010 and the .NET 4.0 framework.


INSTRUCTIONS CAN BE FOUND IN THE PDF CONTAINED IN THE DOWNLOAED ZIP FILE.

Why No Control Arrays?
There is much discussion in the blogosphere regarding why Microsoft removed this feature and how to work around it. In fact, Microsoft themself has a webpage discussing a workaround. At the end of this page, there is a list of several sites which discuss the lack of control arrays in VB.NET , and its alternatives. Many ideas implemented in our code were from those pages, as commented in the code, and they deserve due credit.
